p: The 20D algorithms have been applied in phylogenetic analysis (Nandy 2009), mutational analysis of protein sequences on conserved surface accessible regions and drug target finding in influenza neuraminidase (Ghosh et al. 2010), rotavirus VP7 (Ghosh et al. 2012), Zika virus (Dey et al. 2017a) and others (Dey et al. 2016).
